name: Never Gear Up
description:
Never Gear Up

Never Gear Up is a fighting robot management game made for Ludun Dare 46.

Game Mechanics
Keep your robot alive !

Goal
You need to win fights against other robot and gather their bounty.

Key Features
- Each part of your robot is destructible, same for your enemies
- You start with overpowered gear, but you'll have to replace your body parts sooner or later, and the quality can vary from elite mechs parts to trash or spatula.
- Before each fight, you can choose between 4 randomly generated enemies, some will be stronger but they will usualy also have a higher bounty.
- You start with 5 consumables that can boost your stats for one fight
